item.title: Rep Abuse
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Everyone says it means nothing, yet people still use it as an increment to judge people on their Java skills, or knowledge in general. You guys say ignore it yet most of those people then turn around and say it does mean something to a newer member or someone with low rep. Enough is enough shut up about it not meaning something because your just showing it does mean something.

Another thing neither side of the site is better, they both have things that are similar to each other and different nothing makes one side better so just shut the fuck up with this Moparscape is better or MITB is better, because honestly they’re both the same.

Back to the topic, just because the system sucks and lots of people have 200 rep, that doesn’t mean it should still be abused even more then what it already is. People should be punished for abusing the system no matter what.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep Abuse
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:3, topic:350929"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=447278.msg3283297#msg3283297 date=1280017938]

What do you mean go back to MITB, I have every right to be over here as any of you do.
[/quote]I think they mean your personality is more of that of someone from MITB than someone from here.

(Stuck up, high horse etc)

Wow, you’re being stereotypical, that all people at MITB are stereotypical.

Unbelievable, he has the right to be here.

If anything, there should be more people at MITB here, and less moparscapers.[/quote]inb4 ‘im sry but i’m blind’

[quote=“Davidi2, post:30, topic:350926”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=447278.msg3283365#msg3283365 date=1280022974]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=447278.msg3283297#msg3283297 date=1280017938]

What do you mean go back to MITB, I have every right to be over here as any of you do.
[/quote]I think they mean your personality is more of that of someone from MITB than someone from here.

(Stuck up, high horse etc)

Leave him be.
[/quote]I wasn’t the one that said it, I was just saying what the other people meant… I don’t care if he’s here.[/quote]

I’ll say it AGAIN. I was only answering why they thought Thug Life should go back, doesn’t mean that I thought he should.

item.title: Rep Abuse
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:17, topic:350926”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=447278.msg3282718#msg3282718 date=1279986403]

The obsession with rep over here is astonishing.

Who says its obsession? People can ask questions without it being like that. Go back to MITB…
[/quote]He has a point. The only suggestions I’ve heard about this site in the past year or so have been about reputation. Believe me, I’ve discussed changing the reputation with the vets and there is no turning back. Reputation is staying the way it is. So I’m assuming this means that these threads are going to keep coming up regularly as they do…[/quote]
It depends on what group of MPSC you are talking about, for everybody I talk to, there is no obsession, but for the lower groups of newcomers, or people who think it actually means something, then yes.

@ziplock - Actually, this is not a bad idea.

Read full topic
